name: language-server
description: A language server for InterSystems ObjectScript.
author: InterSystems Corporation

intersystems.language-server.trace.serve.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

intersystems.language-server.formatting..description: Controls the case that ObjectScript commands will be changed to during a document formatting request.
Controls the length that ObjectScript commands will be changed to during a document formatting request.
Controls the case that ObjectScript system functions and variables will be changed to during a document formatting request.
Controls the length that ObjectScript system functions and variables will be changed to during a document formatting request.

intersystems.language-server.hover.comma.description: Controls whether hover information is provided for ObjectScript commands.

intersystems.language-server.hover.syste.description: Controls whether hover information is provided for ObjectScript system functions and variables.

intersystems.language-server.hover.prepr.description: Controls whether hover information is provided for ObjectScript preprocessor directives.

intersystems.language-server.diagnostics.description: Controls whether error diagnostics are provided when a routine or include file that is being referred to doesn't exist in the database.
Controls whether warning diagnostics are provided when a class Parameter has an invalid type or the assigned value of the Parameter doesn't match the declared type.
Controls whether error diagnostics are provided when a class that is being referred to doesn't exist in the database.
Controls whether strikethrough warning diagnostics are provided when a class or class member that is being referred to is deprecated.

intersystems.language-server.signaturehe.description: Controls whether documentation for a method is shown when a SignatureHelp is active. NOTE: This setting does not affect documentation for macro SignatureHelp views, which is always shown.

intersystems.language-server.suggestThem.description: Controls whether the extension will suggest that one of the InterSystems default themes be used if neither one is active upon extension activation.

intersystems.language-server.refactor.ex.description: The name of the exception variable inserted in a 'Wrap in Try/Catch' refactor.

intersystems.language-server.formatting..description: Controls whether short class names will be expanded to include a package during a document formatting request.

intersystems.language-server.diagnostics.markdownDescription: Controls whether diagnostics are provided when a deprecated or superseded `$ZUTIL` function is being called.

intersystems.language-server.diagnostics.description: Controls the languages that syntax error diagnosics will be suppressed for.

intersystems.language-server.diagnostics.markdownDescription: Controls whether diagnostics are provided when a [SQL reserved word](https://docs.intersystems.com/irislatest/csp/docbook/DocBook.UI.Page.cls?KEY=RSQL_reservedwords) is used in a class or property name of a persistent class.

intersystems.language-server.diagnostics.description: Controls whether diagnostics are provided when a local variable may be undefined.

intersystems.language-server.completion..markdownDescription: Controls whether class members with the `Internal` keyword and system globals are shown in completion lists.

intersystems.language-server.completion..description: Controls whether generated classes and class members are shown in completion lists.
Controls whether deprecated classes and class members are shown in completion lists.

semanticTokenTypes.description: InterSystems-wide class and routine name token.
InterSystems-wide system function and variable token.
InterSystems-wide public variable and global token.
InterSystems-wide SQL keyword and datatype token.
Javascript floating point numeric literal token.
Java floating point numeric literal token.
TSQL floating point numeric literal token.
SQL floating point numeric literal token.

scripts.webpack: npm run clean && webpack --mode production --config ./client/webpack.config.js && webpack --mode production --config ./server/webpack.config.js
scripts.webpack:dev: npm run clean && webpack --mode none --config ./client/webpack.config.js && webpack --mode none --config ./server/webpack.config.js
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
